name: Omniknight
title: Purist Thunderwrath
lore: Purist Thunderwrath serves the Omniscience, a deity of order. His protective magic shields allies.

purification.name: Purification
purification.description: Heals an ally while damaging nearby enemies.

heavenlyGrace.name: Heavenly Grace
heavenlyGrace.description: Grants an ally bonus strength and status resistance.

hammerOfPurity.name: Hammer of Purity
hammerOfPurity.description: Omniknight's attacks heal him based on the damage dealt to non-hero units.

guardianAngel.name: Guardian Angel
guardianAngel.description: Grants physical damage immunity to all nearby allies.
